languages.text: {n}Выпятив челюсть, арбитр с непроницаемым лицом изрекает:{/n} "Если столкнетесь с особо упорным сопротивлением, вызывайте меня. Я приду на помощь".
{n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."
languages.original_text: {n}Выпятив челюсть, арбитр с непроницаемым лицом изрекает:{/n} "Если столкнетесь с особо упорным сопротивлением, вызывайте меня. Я приду на помощь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."
{n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."
{n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."
{n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."
{n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne serre les dents, mais son visage reste impénétrable.{/n} « Si vous tombez sur des ennemis opposant une résistance particulièrement farouche, appelez-moi. Je viendrai vous aider. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne serre les dents, mais son visage reste impénétrable.{/n} « Si vous tombez sur des ennemis opposant une résistance particulièrement farouche, appelez-moi. Je viendrai vous aider. »

languages.text: {n}顎を強く食いしばり、感情を読ませない表情のまま、ソロモーンは言った。{/n}「もし特に手強い抵抗に遭遇したら、私を呼んでください。助けに行きますから」
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}顎を強く食いしばり、感情を読ませない表情のまま、ソロモーンは言った。{/n}「もし特に手強い抵抗に遭遇したら、私を呼んでください。助けに行きますから」

languages.text: {n}Apretando la mandíbula con gesto impenetrable, Solomorne declara:{/n} «Si encuentra resistencia especialmente tenaz, llámeme y acudiré en su ayuda».
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Apretando la mandíbula con gesto impenetrable, Solomorne declara:{/n} «Si encuentra resistencia especialmente tenaz, llámeme y acudiré en su ayuda».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙咬紧牙关，面无表情地开了口。{/n}“如果你遇到特别棘手的敌人，就叫我来吧。我会来救你的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙咬紧牙关，面无表情地开了口。{/n}“如果你遇到特别棘手的敌人，就叫我来吧。我会来救你的。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un çenesi kasılıyor. Yüzündeki ifadeyi okumakta zorlanıyorsun.{/n} "Çetin çatışmalarda beni çağırın. Daima yardımınıza koşarım."
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un çenesi kasılıyor, yüzündeki ifadeyi okumakta zorlanıyorsun.{/n} "Çetin çatışmalarda beni çağırın. Daima yardımınıza koşarım."

languages.text: {n}Mit zusammengebissenen Zähnen und undurchdringlicher Miene sagt Solomorne:{/n} "Solltet Ihr auf besonders störrischen Widerstand stoßen, ruft mich. Dann eile ich Euch zu Hilfe."
languages.original_text: {n}Clenching his jaw, his face impenetrable, Solomorne says,{/n} "If you encounter especially stubborn resistance, summon me. I will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit zusammengebissenen Zähnen und undurchdringlicher Miene sagt Solomorne:{/n} "Solltet Ihr auf besonders störrischen Widerstand stoßen, ruft mich. Dann eile ich Euch zu Hilfe."
